DOC.brief_summary: This randomize clinical trial use educational brochure online tutorial program ass sun-protective behavior skin self-examination among African Americans . Skin cancer common among African Americans , disproportionately high mortality rate . Providing brochure online educational program sun-protective behavior may encourage African Americans take preventative measure skin cancer , help improve early skin cancer detection , determine far disease spread , plan best treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Improving Sun-Protective Behaviors Skin Self-Examinations Among African Americans
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . To assess whether educational brochure online program increase sun-protective behavior among African-American patient present general dermatology clinic . SECONDARY OBJECTIVES : I . To assess whether educational brochure online program improve skill skin self-examination among African-American patient present general dermatology clinic . OUTLINE : Participants assign 1 2 arm . ARM I : Participants receive skin cancer educational preventive brochure distribute National Cancer Institute watch 30-minute online tutorial video call X-Plain skin cancer , preventative behavior , skin self-examination . ARM II : Participants receive educational brochure Arm I . After completion study , participant follow 30 day .
DOC.criteria: Selfidentified AfricanAmericans literate fluent English NonAfricanAmericans English illiteracy nonfluency English
